title: Cat (disambiguation)
content:
Cat may refer to:

Contents

  • 1 Followers
  • 2 NPCs
  • 3 Items
  • 4 Quests and events
  • 5 Other

Followers[edit | edit source]

  • Cat, obtainable after completing the Gertrude's Cat quest.
  • Kitten, the small form of a cat.
  • Overgrown cat, the big form of a cat.
  • Wily cat, an overgrown cat turned into master vermin hunter by Felkrash.
  • Lazy cat, a wily cat that has neglected hunting vermin and has become lazy.
  • Hellcat, special colour of cat, obtained by having a regular cat hunt hell-rats in Evil Dave's basement during and after his part in the Recipe for Disaster quest.
  • Toy cat, craftable at a Crafting table 4 in a POH.

NPCs[edit | edit source]

  • Bob, the Jagex cat that features in many quests.
  • Bellemorde, The Face's cat.
  • Black Cat, the cat seen in the inaccessible room in the Black Knights' Fortress.
  • Bones (kitten), Jimmy Dazzler's kitten, who guards the Ardougne Rat Pits.
  • Captain Tom, a cat found in the Keldagrim Rat Pits.
  • Cat (2021 Easter event), the cat encountered by Gregg at the lumberyard during the 2021 Easter event.
  • Cat (Farming Guild), the cat found sleeping on a bench in the northern section of the Farming Guild.
  • Cat (Meiyerditch), the miserable cats found in the Meiyerditch region.
  • Cat (Wintertodt Camp), the cat found in the Wintertodt camp.
  • Claude, a kitten found in the Ardougne Rat Pits.
  • Del-Monty, the cat found in the Sorceress's Garden.
  • Dromund's cat, Dromund the dwarf's cat, guarding the right boot during the The Giant Dwarf quest.
  • Evil Bob, the evil version of Bob, who takes players to his random events.
  • Fluffs' kitten, the kittens Fluffs didn't want to leave behind.
  • Fluffs, Gertrude's cat, which needed to be retrieved during the Gertrude's Cat quest.
  • HRH Hrafn, King Gjuki Sorvott IV's cat, encountered during the The Fremennik Isles quest.
  • Loki, a cat found in the Keldagrim Rat Pits.
  • Mittens, a cat found in the Varrock Rat Pits.
  • Neite, the cat with whom Bob is madly in love.
  • Pox, Hooknosed Jack's cat, encountered during the Ratcatchers quest.
  • Pusskins, a cat found in the Port Sarim Rat Pits.
  • Red Axe Cat, Hreidmar's cat, found in the Red Axe's office.
  • Sphinx, found in Sophanem.
  • The Beast, Smokin' Joe's cat, encountered during the Ratcatchers quest.
  • Topsy, a kitten found in the Ardougne Rat Pits.
  • Treacle, a cat found in the Varrock Rat Pits.
  • Turbogroomer, a cat found in the Port Sarim Rat Pits.
  • Witch's Cat, Kardia's cat, encountered during the Underground Pass quest.

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Cat training medal, obtainable by speaking to Gertrude after catching at least 100 rats with a kitten/cat.
  • Cat antipoison, used in the Ratcatchers quest on Hooknosed Jack's cat Pox.
  • Catspeak amulet, and its enchanted version, used to talk to cats and locate Bob.
  • Wooden cat, craftable at a Crafting table in a POH, used in the The Great Brain Robbery quest.
  • Cat mask, a rare reward obtained from medium treasure trails.
  • Staff of bob the cat, a rare reward obtained from easy treasure trails.

Quests and events[edit | edit source]

  • A Tail of Two Cats, where players need to make Neite fall in love with Bob.
  • Gertrude's Cat, where players need to bring Gertrude's cat home.
  • Big Cats & WWF, a holiday event released on the 23rd of July.

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Cat basket space, a hotspot where players can build various cat baskets.
  • Cat blanket, one of the hotspot options.
  • Cat basket, another of the hotspot options.
  • Cushioned basket, the third of the hotspot options.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Cat''' may refer to:

==Followers==
*[[Cat]], obtainable after completing the [[Gertrude's Cat]] quest.
*[[Kitten]], the small form of a cat.
*[[Overgrown cat]], the big form of a cat.
*[[Wily cat]], an overgrown cat turned into master vermin hunter by [[Felkrash]].
*[[Lazy cat]], a wily cat that has neglected hunting vermin and has become lazy.
*[[Hellcat]], special colour of cat, obtained by having a regular cat hunt [[hell-rat]]s in [[Evil Dave]]'s basement during and after [[Freeing Evil Dave|his part]] in the [[Recipe for Disaster]] quest.
*[[Toy cat]], craftable at a [[Crafting table 4]] in a [[POH]].

==NPCs==
*[[Bob (cat)|Bob]], the Jagex cat that features in many quests.
*[[Bellemorde]], [[The Face]]'s cat.
*[[Black Cat]], the cat seen in the inaccessible room in the [[Black Knights' Fortress]].
*[[Bones (kitten)]], [[Jimmy Dazzler]]'s kitten, who guards the [[Ardougne]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Captain Tom]], a cat found in the [[Keldagrim]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Cat (2021 Easter event)]], the cat encountered by [[Gregg]] at the lumberyard during the [[2021 Easter event]].
*[[Cat (Farming Guild)]], the cat found sleeping on a bench in the northern section of the [[Farming Guild]].
*[[Cat (Meiyerditch)]], the miserable cats found in the [[Meiyerditch]] region. 
*[[Cat (Wintertodt Camp)]], the cat found in the [[Wintertodt camp]].
*[[Claude]], a kitten found in the [[Ardougne]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Del-Monty]], the cat found in the [[Sorceress's Garden]].
*[[Dromund's cat]], [[Dromund]] the dwarf's cat, guarding the [[right boot]] during the [[The Giant Dwarf]] quest.
*[[Evil Bob]], the evil version of Bob, who takes players to his random events.
*[[Fluffs' kitten]], the kittens Fluffs didn't want to leave behind.
*[[Fluffs]], [[Gertrude]]'s cat, which needed to be retrieved during the [[Gertrude's Cat]] quest.
*[[HRH Hrafn]], [[King Gjuki Sorvott IV]]'s cat, encountered during the [[The Fremennik Isles]] quest.
*[[Loki]], a cat found in the [[Keldagrim]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Mittens]], a cat found in the [[Varrock]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Neite]], the cat with whom [[Bob (cat)|Bob]] is madly in love.
*[[Pox]], [[Hooknosed Jack]]'s cat, encountered during the [[Ratcatchers]] quest.
*[[Pusskins]], a cat found in the [[Port Sarim]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Red Axe Cat]], [[Hreidmar]]'s cat, found in the [[Red Axe]]'s office.
*[[Sphinx]], found in [[Sophanem]].
*[[The Beast]], [[Smokin' Joe]]'s cat, encountered during the [[Ratcatchers]] quest.
*[[Topsy]], a kitten found in the [[Ardougne]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Treacle]], a cat found in the [[Varrock]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Turbogroomer]], a cat found in the [[Port Sarim]] [[Rat Pits]].
*[[Witch's Cat]], [[Kardia]]'s cat, encountered during the [[Underground Pass]] quest.

==Items==
*[[Cat training medal]], obtainable by speaking to [[Gertrude]] after catching at least 100 rats with a kitten/cat.
*[[Cat antipoison]], used in the [[Ratcatchers]] quest on [[Hooknosed Jack]]'s cat [[Pox]].
*[[Catspeak amulet]], and its [[catspeak amulet(e)|enchanted version]], used to talk to cats and locate [[Bob (cat)|Bob]].
*[[Wooden cat]], craftable at a [[Crafting table]] in a [[POH]], used in the [[The Great Brain Robbery]] quest.
*[[Cat mask]], a rare reward obtained from [[medium treasure trails]].
*[[Staff of bob the cat]], a rare reward obtained from [[easy treasure trails]].

==Quests and events==
*[[A Tail of Two Cats]], where players need to make [[Neite]] fall in love with [[Bob (cat)|Bob]].
*[[Gertrude's Cat]], where players need to bring Gertrude's cat home.
*[[Big Cats & WWF]], a holiday event released on the 23rd of July.

==Other==
*[[Cat basket space]], a hotspot where players can build various cat baskets.
*[[Cat blanket]], one of the hotspot options.
*[[Cat basket]], another of the hotspot options.
*[[Cushioned basket]], the third of the hotspot options.
